DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: WESTPHALL, C. B.;Westphall, Carlos Becker;Westphall, Carlos

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Carlos Becker Westphall щ Professor Titular da Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina desde 1993, atuando como lэder do Grupo de Redes e Gerъncia, fundador e supervisor do Laboratѓrio de Redes e Gerъncia. Doutor em Informсtica, na especialidade de "Gerъncia de Redes e Serviчos" pela Universitщ de Toulose (Paul Sabatier), na Franчa em 1991. Mestre em Ciъncia da Computaчуo em 1988 e Engenheiro Eletricista em 1985, ambos pela UFRGS. Щ autor e/ou co-autor de mais de 470 publicaчѕes. Recebeu em 2011 o "Awarded IARIA Fellow". Щ (e foi) Membro do Editorial Board de mais de uma dezena periѓdicos. Atua (e atuou) como membro do comitъ de organizaчуo e/ou de programa de centenas de conferъncias. Tem experiъncia na сrea de Ciъncia da Computaчуo e Telecomunicaчѕes, com ъnfase em Administraчуo e Gerъncia de Redes e Serviчos, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: seguranчa, computaчуo autonєmica, computaчуo em nuvem e Internet das Coisas. Fundou a conferъncia LANOMS (Latin American Network Operations and Management Symposium). Tambщm prestou serviчos: para IEEE atuando no CNOM (Committe on Network Operation and Management); para IFIP atuando no "WG6.6 - Management of Networks and Distributed Systems"; para Elsevier como editor do COMNET (Computer Networks Journal); para Springer como editor sъnior do JNSM (Journal of Network and Systems Management) e para o IARIA (International Academy, Research, and Industry Association) como Latin America - IARIA Liaison Board Chair.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Carlos Becker Westphall is Full Professor (since 1993) in the Department of Informatics and Statistics at the Federal University of Santa Catarina - Brazil, where he acts as the leader of the Network and Management Laboratory and also coordinates some projects funded by the Brazilian National Research Council (CNPq). Obtained a degree in Electrical Engineering in 1985 and a M.Sc. degree in Computer Science in 1988, both at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. Obtained a D.Sc. degree in Computer Science (Network Management) at the Universitщ Paul Sabatier, France, in 1991. He acted as a local group coordinator in the European MAX/ESPRIT II project which involved the Alcatel- TITN, British Telecom, HP, CSELT, SIRTI and NKT Companies. 
He was the founder of LANOMS. Technical Program and/or Organizing Committee member (since 1994) of IFIP/IEEE IM (International Symposium on Integrated Network Management), IEEE/IFIP NOMS (Network Operations and Management Symposium), CNSM (International Conference on Network and Service Management), IEEE LANOMS (Latin American NOMS), and IEEE APNOMS (Asia Pacific NOMS). Board of Editors (since 1995) and Senior Technical Editor (from 2003 to 2010) of the Journal of Network and Systems Management of Springer. Editorial Board member (since 2004) of the Computer Networks Journal of Elsevier. Associate Editor (since 2006) of the Journal of Communication and Information Systems of IEEE ComSoc/SBrT. Editorial Board Member (since 01/2009) of the IARIA "International Journal On Advances in Networks and Services" and "International Journal On Advances in Telecommunications".
2011 Awarded IARIA Fellow. Since 1993 member of IFIP TC6 Working Group 6.6 (Management of Networks and Distributed Systems). Since 2003 member of the core team of the TMF UP (TeleManagement Forum Universities Program). Since 2008 Latin America - International Academy, Research, and Industry Association - IARIA Liaison Board Chair. Member 2004-2005 and 2006-2007 of IEEE ComSoc Membership Programs Development Board. From May 2000 to May 2005, he acted as "Secretary" of IEEE CNOM (Committee on Network Operation and Management). From May 2005 to May 2009, he acted as ?Vice-Chair? of IEEE CNOM. Member of IEEE CNOM since 1994.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Westphall has published a paper in 1984 entitled "Receiver for modem in accordance with CCITT Recommendation V.22, in Portuguese", enabling the development of this modem in Brazil. He has presented the first master thesis about network management in Brazil, entitled "Proposition for Data Communications Management Functions" in 1988. He was the youngest Full Professor in Brazilian Federal Universities with 31 years old, in 1993. Supervisor of the first thesis of Ph.D. Program in Computer Science at the Federal University of Santa Catarina, in 2000. The thesis was entitled: "Design, Development and Analysis of a Management System for Secure Telecommunication Networks". He has more than 450 publications and has contributed in more than 370 Organizing and/or Technical Program Committees for conferences in the field of Computer Networks and Network Management. Other important contributions was published in the papers entitled:
"Performance evaluation for proactive network management", in 1996;
"Distributed Network Management Using SNMP, Java, WWW and CORBA", in 2000;
"Decentralized Network Management Using Distributed Artificial Intelligence", in 2001;
"Grids of Agents for Computer and Telecommunication Network Management", in 2004;
"Grid-M: Middleware to integrate mobile devices, sensors and grid computing", in 2007;
"Intrusion Detection for Grid and Cloud Computing", in 2010;
"A Cloud Computing Solution for Patient's Data Collection in Health Care Institutions", in 2010;
"Toward an Architecture for Monitoring Private Clouds", in 2011;
"Environment, Services and Network Management for Green Clouds", in 2012;
"Provisioning and Resource Allocation for Green Clouds" in 2013;
"Optimizing Green Clouds through Legacy Network Infrastructure Management" in 2014; and
"Cloud resource management: a survey on forecasting and profiling models" in 2015.
"Cloud identity management: a survey on privacy strategies" in 2017.

Devido р explosуo de complexidade dos serviчos exigidos e do tamanho das redes de computadores e telecomunicaчѕes, novos conceitos devem ser agregados ao gerenciamento de redes e serviчos..

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Devido р explosуo de complexidade dos serviчos exigidos e do tamanho das redes de computadores e telecomunicaчѕes, novos conceitos devem ser agregados ao gerenciamento de redes e serviчos. PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Os principais problemas associados р implementaчуo e uso da gerъncia de redes e serviчos ocorrem devido р grande quantidade de proposiчѕes, padrѕes e de diferentes produtos oferecidos no mercado, dificultando consideravelmente a tomada de decisуo no que se refere a utilizaчуo da abordagem de gerъncia de redes e serviчos mais adequada. INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF COMMUNICATION NETWORKS AND INFORMATION SECURITY (P

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: International Journal of Communication Networks and Information Security (IJCNIS) is a scholarly peer reviewed international scientific journal published three times (April, August, December) in a year, focusing on theories, methods, and applications in networks and information security. It provides a challenging forum for researchers, industrial professionals, engineers, managers, and policy makers working in the field to contribute and disseminate innovative new work on networks and information security.
